pli-tv-bu-vb-sk28:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk28:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, ākirantepi atikkantepi na jānanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk28:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
